headline: Arista Networks (ANET) Is Down 5.1% After Raising 2026 AI Revenue Outlook And Beating Q4 Estimates – Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: In recent weeks, Arista Networks reported stronger-than-expected Q4 2025 results, raised its fiscal 2026 AI revenue guidance, and highlighted robust demand for Ethernet-based AI data center networking solutions. This combination of operational outperformance and a more confident AI roadmap has sharpened investor focus on Arista’s role at the core of next-generation cloud and artificial intelligence infrastructure. Next, we’ll examine how Arista’s upgraded AI revenue outlook and strong...

headline: Why 1 Analyst Thinks Arista Networks Stock Can Still Gain Over 50% This Year
summary: One top analyst sees over 50% upside in Arista Networks as accelerating AI data center demand and strong execution might fuel a potential run.

headline: Is Arista Networks’ Stock Outperforming the S&P 500?
summary: Given Arista Networks’ pronounced outperformance relative to the broader S&P 500 over the past year, Wall Street analysts remain emphatically bullish on the company’s forward growth trajectory.

headline: OpenAI announces $110 billion funding round with backing from Amazon, Nvidia, SoftBank
summary: OpenAI's latest funding round is even bigger than its prior financing, which was a record amount for private tech companies.

raw.headline: OpenAI announces $110 billion funding round with backing from Amazon, Nvidia, SoftBank

headline: An Indian company is set to build a $2 billion AI hub with Nvidia’s GPUs and go public. Here's what we know so far
summary: Yotta Data Services, which controls up to 70% of India’s GPU capacity, said surging demand from local AI startups and global tech firms is tightening supply.
